data.class: Extra classes to apply to anchor
data.href: The link fot the anchor tag (this or name is required)
data.role: Set the role of the anchor
data.target: Set the target of the link
data.title: Add a title to the link
data.content: The content of the link if isDataModel is used

content: Content of ux-anchor is yielded to if not in isDataModel mode when content is used

events.anchorClicked: Event to fire when component is clicked
